**EARTHQUAKE RESPONSE:**
- Drop, Cover, and Hold On
- Stay away from windows and heavy objects
- If outdoors, move away from buildings
- After shaking stops, evacuate if building damaged

**FLOOD RESPONSE:**
- Move to higher ground immediately
- Avoid walking/driving through flood water
- Turn off utilities if safe to do so
- Listen for official evacuation orders

**FIRE/WILDFIRE RESPONSE:**
- Evacuate immediately if ordered
- Close all windows and doors
- Remove flammable materials from around buildings
- Have emergency supplies ready

**SEVERE WEATHER:**
- Monitor weather alerts continuously
- Seek shelter in sturdy building
- Stay away from windows during high winds
- Have emergency communications plan
